review_data.title: Would go there again!

review_data.title: Weather permitting sit in the street
review_data.content: When we visited in August we chose to sit at the tables in the street. This is great way to watch the world of Zurich pass by. We found the staff to be very friendly and appreciated the good choice of beers on tap. Cheers!

review_data.title: outstanding pub in Zurich
review_data.content: very nice and warming pub in Zurich, the crew is just amazing and the Manager is welcoming as a buddy! the service is great and efficient with a very good atmosphere, definitely the place to go for a good beer between good lads in Zurich!

review_data.title: Best place in Zurich

review_data.title: Very good

review_data.title: Place nice to be
review_data.content: Very nice place in center of the city with nice terace,friendly staff with nice warm smile,agood number of bear selection and good quality of snacks.good music with free entrance.I really enjoyed my weekend there and sure I will be back again :)

review_data.title: Great progressive Happy Hour

review_data.title: Good times
review_data.content: Had a great time watching the Euro Cup here. Lots of tvs and a really amazing staff. Also the upstairs lounge area definitely adds to the experience.

review_data.title: Probably best place to wach UEFA cup final
review_data.content: After reading reviews and forums, I picked another pub to wach UEFA Cup final in Zurich. However, it was fully booked and had limited TV screens with a lot of loud English fans. We found Lady Hamilton's Pub just by chance - and never regreted...More

review_data.title: Average at best!

review_data.title: Lovely English Styled Pub

review_data.title: Friendly staff, cheap happy hour beer prices

review_data.title: Avoid this place worst food on earth
